name: Super Spooky Alley Deluxe
description:
Those damn ghosts spooking in the alley! Destroy them all with your anti-ghost-ray™! Watch out for projectiles, some slow you down and others might shock you. Oh, and don't cross the streams!

Features
  • 1 or 2 player buddy cop arcade action
  • 10 waves, increasing in difficulty
  • endboss after completing wave 10
  • 3 different spooky opponents
  • revive your partner by surviving the wave (no pressure)
Goals
  • destroy 10 ghosts to advance the next wave
  • survive 10 waves in total
  • remain friends with player 2
Controls
  • use either keyboard or gamepads
  • a/d keys move player 1 & spacebar shoots
  • arrow keys move player 2 & right ctrl shoots
